result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kayla Madeline Alcaide

records.addlTxt: 130  State appears by Attorney Alexandra Smathers.   DE appeared with Atty Michael Forella.  Clerk Dana A.  Minutes: DE waives preliminary hearing; probable cause found.  Bound over.   Information filed; reading waived.  Not guilty plea entered. Scheduling Order given to Attorney in court.  Judicial Pretrial - in court on December 14th, 2022, Br. 2 @ 8:30 AM. Bond continued.
Judicial Pretrial - in court on December 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Atty reschedules STC from 10-5 to 10-12 at 1pm Intake  DA notified.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Status conference on October 5, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant, Kayla Madeline Alcaide, appeared.  Attorney Thomas Binger appeared for the Prosecution.    Clerk JT  Minutes:    SPD has been unable to appoint an attorney for DE for today's hearing. Court holds colloquy with DE re: proceeding pro se or waiving time to allow SPD to appoint an attorney.  DE waives time for preliminary hearing. Court reschedules preliminary hearing to an attorney status hearing. Court modifies bond to allow no discussion of the case with co-def's all other conditions remain.  Status conference scheduled for October 5, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: Jay G, Walmart - Kenosha Co.   **No discussion of the case with Amy A and Jocelyn A.
